m_szDocSumamry: EPA’s Green Power Partnership Helps Big Corporations Greenwash February 27th, 2012 by John Farrell     While I generally have nothing but praise for the Environmental Protection Agency, its  Green Power Partnership program falls short of the agency’s usual standard.  In particular, the program – providing media recognition for participating companies who procure renewable energy – inflates the activities of large companies at the expense of businesses whose clean energy transformation is much more meaningful.
